[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@fizz/ui-components](./ui-components.md) &gt; [Dialog](./ui-components.dialog.md)

## Dialog class

Base class for purpose-specific dialogs. Includes a title bar and customizable buttons. Provides a single slot for content.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class Dialog extends LitElement 
```
**Extends:** LitElement
